doc.title: indexOf
doc.description: returns the first index at which a given element can be found in the array.

content.name: indexOf
content.description: The indexOf() method returns the first index at which a given element can be found in the array, or -1 if it is not present.

params.description: The position to start searching from, if known.
params.name: fromIndex

params.description: The target item to search for.
params.name: searchElement

params.description: The array (or array-like) to search within.
params.name: array

content.summary: returns the first index at which a given element can be found in the array.

args.description: The position to start searching from, if known.
args.name: fromIndex

args.description: The target item to search for.
args.name: searchElement

args.description: The array (or array-like) to search within.
args.name: array
